description: These Turkish pides make a delicious light lunch or snack, filled with lightly spiced spinach and feta spiked ricotta.
name: Spinach & Ricotta Pide Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the flour, sugar, yeast and salt into a large bowl and stir to combine. Add 80ml of warm water and 2 tablespoons of oil and mix to combine. Tip on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 5 minutes until smooth and springy.
Place in an oiled bowl and cover with a damp towel. Set aside to rise in a warm place for 1 hour.
Add the remaining oil to a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the cumin and spinach and cook for 2-3 minutes, until wilted, adding the spinach in batches.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Mix the ricotta and feta together in a small bowl. Tip the dough on to a floured work surface and cut into 4 pieces. Roll each piece into an oval shape.

Place the dough ovals on a lined baking tray and spoon the spinach mix onto each, leaving a border around the edges. Roll the edges up to form a crust. Top with filling with ricotta mix. Brush the edges with beaten egg and bake for 10-15 minutes until golden and crisp.
